keyMoments.title: Rokuroshi's Debut as Head Referee
keyMoments.description: Rokuroshi debuts as the head referee for the Hit & Dead Ball game, introducing the complex rules of pirate dodgeball.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a new anime-exclusive character who serves as the authority figure for the game, enabling the Foxy Pirates to manipulate rules to their advantage.

keyMoments.title: Disqualifies Zoro
keyMoments.description: Rokuroshi disqualifies Zoro from the game for cutting the ball with his sword.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates his strict enforcement of rules while maintaining the appearance of fairness.

keyMoments.title: Disqualifies Luffy for Swallowing Ball
keyMoments.description: Rokuroshi declares that swallowing balls is forbidden and disqualifies Luffy from the game.
keyMoments.significance: Removes the Straw Hats' strongest fighter, demonstrating how the complex rulebook can be used against players.

abilities.description: As head referee, Rokuroshi has authority to enforce or create any rules during Davy Back Fight games.

relationships.description: Rokuroshi serves as a crew member of the Foxy Pirates and acts as referee during their Davy Back Fight games.

evolutionMoments.description: Rokuroshi introduced as the head referee working for the Foxy Pirates.

reveals.information: Head referee for Foxy Pirates' Davy Back Fight games
Has authority to enforce or create game rules

keyMoments.title: Gina's Debut
keyMoments.description: Gina appears during the Hit & Dead Ball game as a member of the Foxy Pirates, working alongside Porche to distract Sanji.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces another anime-exclusive member of the Foxy Pirates. Her appearance as a shipwright foreshadows the crew's technical capabilities.

keyMoments.title: Distracts Sanji
keyMoments.description: Gina and Porche deliberately distract Sanji with their feminine charms, exploiting his weakness for beautiful women.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Foxy Pirates' willingness to use any tactic within the rules to gain an advantage.

abilities.description: Gina possesses skills in building and repairing vessels as the Foxy Pirates' shipwright.

relationships.description: Gina serves as the shipwright for the Foxy Pirates.

evolutionMoments.description: Gina introduced as a member of the Foxy Pirates crew.

relationships.description: Gina works alongside Porche to distract opponents during the Davy Back Fight games.

evolutionMoments.description: Gina and Porche team up to distract Sanji during the dodgeball game.

reveals.information: Uses feminine charms to gain advantages in competitions

keyMoments.title: Wins Roller Race
keyMoments.description: Luffy wins the roller race and successfully reclaims Chopper for the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Resolves the previous game and reunites the crew, but leads to another challenge.
keyMoments.quote: Chopper, you're coming back with us!

keyMoments.title: Accepts Rematch Challenge
keyMoments.description: Luffy impulsively accepts Foxy's challenge for a three-coin Davy Back Fight rematch despite crew protests.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's competitive nature and lack of strategic foresight, putting his crew at risk again.

keyMoments.title: Disqualified for Swallowing Ball
keyMoments.description: Luffy catches a ball with his mouth and swallows it, resulting in his disqualification from the game.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's impulsive and thoughtless actions costing his team their strongest fighter.

keyMoments.title: Disqualified for Cutting Ball
keyMoments.description: Zoro instinctively cuts an incoming dodgeball with his sword, violating the game rules and resulting in his disqualification.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates how Zoro's swordsman instincts can work against him in non-combat situations.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Rejoins Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Chopper is reclaimed by Luffy after the roller race victory and rejoins the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Reunites Chopper with his crew after being temporarily taken by the Foxy Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Clever Face Hit Defense
keyMoments.description: Chopper reveals that he was hit in the face rather than the body, which doesn't count as an out, earning audience support.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Chopper's understanding of the game rules and ability to use them to his advantage.

keyMoments.title: Disqualified for Out of Bounds
keyMoments.description: Chopper goes out of bounds while trying to avoid a ball and is disqualified from the game.
keyMoments.significance: Further reduces the Straw Hats' numbers in the dodgeball match.

keyMoments.title: Distracted by Gina and Porche
keyMoments.description: Sanji is deliberately distracted by Gina and Porche's feminine charms, compromising his performance in the dodgeball game.
keyMoments.significance: Highlights Sanji's consistent character weakness for beautiful women that can be exploited by opponents.

keyMoments.title: Demands Rematch
keyMoments.description: Foxy declares 'there should be no draws in the Pirate world' and challenges the Straw Hats to a three-coin rematch.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Foxy's competitive nature and refusal to accept defeat, extending the Davy Back Fight arc.
keyMoments.quote: There should be no draws in the Pirate world!

keyMoments.title: Wins First Round of Rematch
keyMoments.description: The Foxy Pirates win the Hit & Dead Ball game, gaining an early advantage in the rematch.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Foxy Pirates' lead and demonstrates the effectiveness of their rule-manipulation tactics.
